text: Jennifer Todd (born in 1969 in California) is an American movie producer.Hollywood Reporter: Jennifer Todd Named President of Ben Affleck and Matt Damon's Production Co. - Hollywood Reporter, accessdate: October 23, 2015 She and her sister Suzanne run a production company called "Team Todd". They have helped make movies including the three Austin Powers movies, Boiler Room, Prime, Must Love Dogs, Memento, Across the Universe, and The Accidental Husband. She won the 2001 Independent Spirit Award for best movie for Memento. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movie producers Category:1969 births Category:Living people
title: Jennifer Todd
